data.title: Maltagenealogy
data.meta_description: Conte Palatine Sant 1769 & Conte (Graf) Sant, 1770. Last Update: 16-04-2023. Salvatore Baldassare Sant was granted the title of Conte in virtue of a patent granted, on the 22nd December 1770, by the Empress Maria Theresa in the Italian Provinces annexed to the German Empire. In this grant, a condition is attached by which the […]
data.text:

Lords of Santorini, Therasia and sometime Dukes of Crete.

Last update: 15-03-2023.

All Corrections/Additions are Welcome
